title: Save up to 15% when you buy the TicWatch Atlas!
description: It's got a great battery and sturdy build. The post Save up to 15% when you buy the TicWatch Atlas! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: It's got a great battery and sturdy build.
text: Mobvoi’s line of TicWatch smart wearables have always excelled when it came to basics like battery life and everyday usability. That being said, Mobvoi’s latest TicWatch Atlas continues this trend thanks to its rugged design and improved battery life. It’s also 20% cheaper at the moment with this deal, bringing its price down to less than 300 bucks. READ: TicWatch Atlas Review: Ruggedly Smart For hardware, the TicWatch Atlas features a rugged design with 5ATM water resistance and MIL-STD-810H certification, a 1.43-inch OLED display with Sapphire Crystal protection for added durability, Qualcomm’s Snapdragon W5+ Gen 1 processor, as well as other features such as 2GB RAM and 32GB storage, Bluetooth 5.2 and 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, and a 628 mAh battery that can outlast most other smartwatches on the market. You can check out the deal with the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
html:
Mobvoi’s line of TicWatch smart wearables have always excelled when it came to basics like battery life and everyday usability. That being said, Mobvoi’s latest TicWatch Atlas continues this trend thanks to its rugged design and improved battery life. It’s also 20% cheaper at the moment with this deal, bringing its price down to less than 300 bucks.

READ: TicWatch Atlas Review: Ruggedly Smart

For hardware, the TicWatch Atlas features a rugged design with 5ATM water resistance and MIL-STD-810H certification, a 1.43-inch OLED display with Sapphire Crystal protection for added durability, Qualcomm’s Snapdragon W5+ Gen 1 processor, as well as other features such as 2GB RAM and 32GB storage, Bluetooth 5.2 and 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, and a 628 mAh battery that can outlast most other smartwatches on the market. You can check out the deal with the link below.
